Package userRules

Class Summary
ExampleColorAverage For each of the three color components (red, green, and blue), this rule finds the average red, the average blue, and the average green of a cell and its neighbors.
ExampleRealAverage Finds the average of a cell and all of its neighbors.
ExampleVectorAverage Finds the average of a cell and all of its neighbors.
MinimumRule A CA rule that updates a cell's state to be the minimum of its neighbors and itself.
ObjectExample Finds the average of a cell and all of its neighbors.
Rule102 A rule which calculates the sum modulo N of a cell and one of its neighbors (the last neighbor in its list of neighbors).
SearsTower A rule which calculates (cell + (generation * (sum of neighbors)) % 3) % N.
ThreeXPlusOne A rule which uses the 3x+1 problem to calculate the next state of a cell.
YoungVsOld Young versus Old is a rule that will generate a cells value based both on the value of its neighbors and the number of neighbors.
